text: Ghatkopar East constituency is one of the 26 Vidhan Sabha constituencies located in the Mumbai Suburban district. Bhandup west is part of the Mumbai North East Lok Sabha constituency along with five other Vidhan Sabha segments, namely Mulund, Ghatkopar West, Bhandup West, Mankhurd Shivaji Nagar and Vikhroli in the Mumbai Suburban district. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== Key {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="2"|Election!!Member!!Party |- | rowspan="3" style="background-color: " | | 2009 | rowspan="2" | Prakash Mehta | rowspan="3" | Bharatiya Janata Party |- | 2014 |- |2019 |Parag Shah |} ==Election results== ===Assembly Elections 2009=== ===Assembly Elections 2014=== ==See also== * List of constituencies of Maharashtra Vidhan Sabha ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Mumbai Category:Assembly constituencies of Maharashtra Category:Politics of Mumbai Suburban district
title: Ghatkopar East (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
